| 3110 | d7cb3211-3900-4284-98cb-5a994409bed0 | assistant     |   1.6801e+09  | In QlikView, you can load multiple Excel files from a folder using the "Load" statement and the "FOR EACH" statement. Here's an example script:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | finished_successfully | 5f8776a9-0dd5-4704-8a95-1751d888ad0b |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | FOR EACH File in FileList('C:\Folder\*.xlsx')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     // Load the file                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     LOAD *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     FROM [$(File)]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     (ooxml, embedded labels, table is Sheet1);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     // Rename the sheet name dynamically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     LET SheetName = FieldValue('Table', 1);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     RENAME FIELD Table TO [$(SheetName)];                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | NEXT                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | In the above script, the "FileList" function is used to get a list of all the Excel files in the specified folder. The "FOR EACH" statement is then used to loop through each file in the list.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Within the loop, the "LOAD" statement is used to load the contents of the file. The "FROM" clause specifies the path to the file, while the "ooxml" option tells QlikView to use the Excel 2007 format. The "embedded labels" option tells QlikView to use the first row of each sheet as field names. The "table is Sheet1" option tells QlikView to load only the first sheet in each file.                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | After loading the data, the "RENAME FIELD" statement is used to dynamically rename the sheet to the sheet name in the Excel file. The "FieldValue" function is used to get the sheet name, and the "RENAME FIELD" statement is used to rename the "Table" field to the sheet name.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Note that this script assumes that each Excel file has only one sheet. If your Excel files have multiple sheets, you'll need to modify the script to load each sheet separately.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |

| 3147 | 891e0be5-d917-4cab-95f0-55b268bdff1a | assistant     |   1.68008e+09 | Rollback refers to the process of undoing a transaction that has already been committed to a database. A rollback can be initiated for various reasons, such as when an error occurs during a transaction or when the transaction violates some integrity constraints. The rollback process restores the database to its previous state before the transaction started, effectively canceling the effects of the committed transaction.                                            | finished_successfully | d0034b00-ef4d-444d-8107-88521587ac12 |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Here's an example of a rollback in a hypothetical banking system:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Suppose a customer named John wants to transfer $1000 from his checking account to his savings account. The following SQL statements may be used to perform this transaction:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | BEGIN TRANSACTION;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | UPDATE checking SET balance = balance - 1000 WHERE account_number = '123456';                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | UPDATE savings SET balance = balance + 1000 WHERE account_number = '789012';                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | COMMIT;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Assuming there are no errors or constraints violations, the transaction is successfully committed, and the balances of both accounts are updated accordingly. However, suppose an error occurs during the second update statement, causing the transaction to fail. In this case, a rollback may be initiated to undo the first update statement and restore the checking account's balance to its original value. The following SQL statement can be used to initiate a rollback: |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ROLLBACK;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | After the rollback is completed, the checking account's balance is restored to its original value, and the savings account's balance remains unchanged. The rollback ensures that the database is consistent and prevents any unintended changes that may have occurred if the failed transaction were allowed to remain committed.                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | To create two columns, one with the names of the months and another with 12 repetitions of the month names, you can use the following steps in QlikView:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 1. Create a new script in the script editor and enter the following code:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | LET vMonthNames = 'Jan,Feb,Mar,Apr,May,Jun,Jul,Aug,Sep,Oct,Nov,Dec';                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | MonthNames:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | LOAD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     FieldValue('$(vMonthNames)', RecNo()) AS MonthName                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | AUTOGENERATE FieldValueCount('$(vMonthNames)');                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | FOR i = 1 TO 12                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     MonthList:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     LOAD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         FieldValue('$(vMonthNames)', i) AS MonthName,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         $(i) AS MonthNumber                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     INLINE [                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         MonthNumber                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     ];                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | NEXT                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. This code will create two tables - "MonthNames" and "MonthList". The "MonthNames" table will have one field - "MonthName" - which will contain the names of the 12 months. The "MonthList" table will have two fields - "MonthName" and "MonthNumber". The "MonthName" field will contain the names of the 12 months repeated 12 times, and the "MonthNumber" field will contain the numbers 1 to 12, repeated 12 times.                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 3. Now that you have your two tables, you can load them into your QlikView document and use them to create a chart. For example, you can create a straight table chart with the "MonthName" field as the dimension and the "MonthNumber" field as the expression.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 4. When you create the chart, you will see that the "MonthName" field contains the names of the 12 months, and the "MonthNumber" field contains the numbers 1 to 12, repeated 12 times. You can format the "MonthName" field to display the month names in the format you prefer. For example, you can use the following number format code: "MMM". This will display the month names in the three-letter abbreviated format (e.g. "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", etc.).                     |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | I hope this revised answer helps you achieve your desired result.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
